nodes.text: Yaralou was a saturated planet with no moons that occupied the fourth orbital position around the yellow star Baralou, which was located within the Baralou system of the Outer Rim Territories' Varada sector.

Yaralou was first mentioned in Planets of the Galaxy, Volume One, a 1991 sourcebook for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Baralou system, and therefore Yaralou, in grid square H-20.
